code: import{CartActionTypes}from'./cart.actionType';export var cartAddItem=function cartAddItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.CART_ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var cartRemoveItem=function cartRemoveItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.CART_REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var cartclearItem=function cartclearItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.CART_CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};
